description:
An intuitive diagram software with templates for any scenario.

EdrawMax is a powerful, all-in-one, and yet easy-to-use diagramming tool that enables users to visualize the ideas effortlessly. With EdrawMax, you can create and customize flowcharts, Venn diagrams, mind maps, organizational charts, Gantt charts, UML diagrams, electrical drawings, genograms, building plans, etc.
New One-Stop Image Processing Feature, including:
1. Smart Background Removal – remove image backgrounds with one click;
2. Image Object Removal – erase selected elements from an image;
3. Image Enhancement – instantly improve image clarity with one click.
AI-to-3D Floor Plan Conversion
Floor plans now support AI-powered 3D conversion, with intelligent adaptation to multiple scene styles.
AI Drawing Upgrade
The AI Drawing feature has been upgraded to Image Generation within the Diagram Agent.Image quality has been significantly improved, with support for generating floor plans, organizational charts, electrical engineering diagrams, process flow diagrams, biomedical diagrams, posters, and more.
Shape Count
Added a Shape Count feature, available in the Advanced menu.
Edit Text in Images
Added support for recognizing text within images and editing or replacing it directly.
Batch Image Import via Excel
Supports batch importing images via Excel to generate symbol libraries with shape data.
Export Symbols and Attributes to Excel
Supports one-click export of canvas symbols and their attributes to Excel.
Text Formatting Enhancements
● Added support for overline text
Other Improvements
Additional experience optimizations and bug fixes.
